faq1.question: Why download TikTok Notes videos and photos?
faq1.answer: Many young people come to TikTok Notes to share a private story with specific audiences and followers through videos. So, download those videos and you will get lots of unique exclusive content to rewatch and repost to Twitter, Instagram, or Facebook.

faq2.question: Can I download a video on TikTok Notes directly?
faq2.answer: TikTok Notes only supports saving and spinning a video on the feed, not downloading it directly to your personal device. So, you need a third party Thread downloader to make it done.

faq3.question: How can I download a TikTok Notes video on iPhone/Android?
answer: On the TikTok Notes app, tap on the direct symbol under the post the choose copy link
Open Snapsave.app by a browser then choose TikTok Notes downloader
Paste the link to the toolbar and tap the download button
Hit the download button again then save it to your device

faq4.question: Do the creators know if I downloaded their content on TikTok Notes?
faq4.answer: No, they don’t. With our Thread video downloader you can download videos, pictures, audio on TikTok Notes anonymously.

faq5.question: Is it legal to download TikTok Notes videos?
faq5.answer: Yes, it is legal to save TikTok Notes videos for purposes like rewatching, memories save. Please consider the copyright issues if you want to reuse the content.

faq6.question: Do you put watermarks on downloaded TikTok Notes videos?
faq6.answer: No, we don’t. Snapsave doesn’t impose a watermark on the photos, or clips you download here.

faq7.question: What should I do if a TikTok Notes video download fails?
faq7.answer: Our tool might encounter overloaded performance, leading to download failure. Please try again by F5 or contact technical support for help.
